content.text: Algiers , Mar 1 ( AFP ) Several people were hurt Friday in violent clashes between police and protesters in the Algerian capital , AFP journalists said , during demonstrations against a bid by ailing President Abdelaziz Bouteflika to seek a fifth term . A number of the injured suffered head wounds after being hit by batons or stones thrown by police back at demonstrators who had initially hurled them at officers . Riot police also fired tear gas to try to disperse a group of around 200 young people , around 1.5 kilometres from the presidential palace .
